data.title: Facility Rental / Conference Centers
data.meta_description: Oconee Fall Line Technical College offers a variety of venues for hosting your social or corporate event and is conveniently located in central Georgia.
data.text:
Oconee Fall Line Technical College offers you the perfect location and a variety of venues for hosting your upcoming social and corporate events and is conveniently located in central Georgia, only a short drive from Atlanta, Savannah, Columbus, Augusta and all points in between.

Thank you for thinking of OFTC venues for your upcoming event. Letâ€™s start working on the planning of your next successful event.
